text: @realDonaldTrump @OANN C’mon, Sybil, this is over the top Batshit crazy, even for you. BTW- 110k dead- great job on your Covid-19 response. A “strong economy” can’t bring them back. #BunkerTrump #BunkerBoy #TrumpRecession #TrumpMeltdown #COVID__19 #TrumpDictatorship #TrumpHasNoPlan
